Title: Shion 6
Description: Shion 6 is an IRC Client built from the ground up. With Shion your in control of your IRC Experience.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Shion 6 is an IRC Client built from the ground up. With Shion your in control of your IRC Experience.

Features
  • A streamline, simple UI with easy to operate functions yet powerful
  • Themeable using the Shion EDK (Not yet created)
  • HTML Renderer powered off Gecko HTML Renderer

Compiling
For help on compiling Shion see Compiling Shion

Requrement to versions RC1 and later
Registration is now mandatory for RC1 and later. You may download the License Manager at http://nasutek.com/activation/?o=getclient. Instructions about activation are available @ http://nasutek.com/activation/?o=help.
